email_body: i said i'm a vp and run natural gas derivatives trading and she asked if she could eliminate derivatives because then she'd have to write two more sentences about what that was. "Jennifer White" <jenwhite7@zdnetonebox.com> on 01/11/2001 01:13:11 PM To: john.arnold@enron.com cc: Subject: There is no John Taylor at Ocean, and I don't remember the other name you mentioned on the phone. Whoever you were talking to last night was confused. I found the article in the Baltimore Sun. Since when are you VP of natural gas trading? I'm meeting the girls at Saba tonight in the event you don't have plans and want to join us.
